title: Orangeliner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, choose a player. If they're doused, **Orangeline** them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Orangelined players have roleblock and prevention immunity and will douse the first non-Underworld player that they visit that night.
- If you would Orangeline a nondoused player for any reason, you will fail to do so.

desc:
Post 2694
*Let's have exactly one regret. This was never a path in the first place.*
